title: Greenwillow
description: A lyrical and poetic fable, "Greenwlllow" tells of the romance between young Gideon Briggs, who walks in the shadow of a family curse and vows never to marry, and Dorrie, the orphan girl he loves. "Greenwillow" was brought to the Broadway stage in 1960, starring Anthony Perkins, and with words and music by Frank Loesser.
author: B.J. Chute
